Title: Anti-acne
Description: Prevent and fight against acne by preventing and unclogging clogged pores

Title: Anti-aging
Description: Slows your skin aging, reduce age spots, or prevent wrinkles

Title: Anti-bacterial
Description: Control micro-organisms growth on your skin

Title: Brightening
Description: Fade brownish spots (hyper-pigmentation) caused by sun damage or PIH (post-inflammatory hyper-pigmentation)

Title: Hydrating
Description: Attract water to the outermost layer of the skin

Title: Moisturizing
Description: Lubricate the skin to prevent water from escaping

Title: pH balancer
Description: pH balanced skincare for optimal skincare benefits

Title: UV protection
Description: Protects your skin from UV lights
